note: Gross domestic product (GDP) is measured in constant international dollars, which corrects for inflation and cross-country price differences.
title: Per capita CO₂ emissions from domestic aviation vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Domestic aviation represents flights which depart and arrive within the same country.

display.name: Per capita  CO₂ from domestic aviation

sourceDesc: ICCT - Graver, Zhang and Rutherford (2019); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
